SamPy.bolshoi.plotMassRatios.MultipleLocator¶

class SamPy.bolshoi.plotMassRatios.MultipleLocator(base=1.0)¶

Set a tick on every integer that is multiple of base in the view interval

__init__(base=1.0)¶
